answers.answer: I don't really have advice on how to make the baby come on its own as it is up to your own body, but I will say that should it get to that point, just remember that the doctor is choosing inducement for both of your safety. After a certain point the baby loses what it needs to survive inside of you. More likely the doctor is trying to prevent that.
iHave heard The Hot Tub Is Really Good N Also Doin Squads Thats Wat Made My Friend Go N 2 Labor

I dont think being induced is bad. I was with dd and I didnt have any pain meds. Idk what natural you mean without any meds at all like pitocin or just pain meds I guess im confused on wat natural means?

I understand that being induced is what will be best for our health I just do not want the pitocin because wth my first it made things horrible, my contractions became too painful, whereas before I had it I was perfectly comfortable. Not to mention the doctors were taking full advantage of the fact I was in pain and kept forcing the epidural on me...Just not a fun experience I want this birth to be more enjoyable.

I didn't want to be induced either, but I ended up with preeclampsia.  I was 2cm and 70% so it took the lowest dose of pitocin to get things going.  I was able to sit on the birthing ball and walk around as far as the monitors would let me as long as my BP stayed down.  Since I only needed a low dose of the pitocin I made it through drug free.  I wish the same for you if induction is needed, even though you can't have your water birth that way, you can still make it drug free.  I told the Dr. how I felt about the pitocin ( it was horrible with my first) and she promised as long as the contractions kept coming regular and didn't slow down they wouldn't up it.  Talk to them and tell them your concerns and see how much they will work with you.

question: I'm now 40w2d and if my baby girl doesn't come by Sunday I'll be induced Monday morning...I really want to avoid being induced because I was planning on having a natural water birth. I have tried walking, primrose oil and raspberry leaf tea but it obviously isn't working.  I am 3cm but hardly any contractions but lost my plug last week. Anyone have any tips? My first DD went 3 days over due so maybe this one will be the same and I wont have to be induced *fingers crossed*
title: Really dont want to be induced
